lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Where will people first see Jesus, the Son of Man, when He returns?
answers: In the clouds
In the temple
On a mountain in Jerusalem
In their minds

questions.text: What will Jesus do with those who have died, both evil and good?
answers: Raise them from the dead
Leave them in the grave
Turn them into angels
Send them immediately to heaven or hell

questions.text: After sitting on His throne, what will Jesus do with all the people?
answers: Separate them like a shepherd separates sheep and goats
Mix them all up together
Yell at everyone for sinning
Ask them to choose which side they want to be on

questions.text: Who are the sheep and who are the goats?
answers: Sheep are believers; goats are unbelievers
Sheep are unbelievers; goats are believers
Sheep are rich; goats are poor
Sheep are angels; goats are demons
They will enter God’s forever kingdom
They will be tested
They will return to the grave
They will be punished
They will be punished forever for their sins
They will get a second chance
They will be send back to the grave
They will enter God's forever kingdom

questions.text: What will our resurrected bodies be like?
answers: Glorious, beautiful, strong, and lasting forever
Invisible and ghost-like
Exactly the same as now
We won't have bodies

questions.text: What will happen to heaven and earth when Jesus returns?
answers: God will make a new heaven and a new earth
They will stay exactly the same
God will make it grow twice as big
They will be thrown into the sun

questions.text: What will God’s forever kingdom be like?
answers: No sickness, pain, sadness, or death
Lots of hard work and rules
Only nice people can
Clouds and harps everywhere

questions.text: How can we be ready for Jesus’ return?
answers: Believe the good news
Try really hard to obey
Watch the sky every day
Build an ark like Noah
